page.title: 04WEST BOWERS LITTLE BADDOW
page.content: West Bowers is a mixed farm and is owned by Mr Warner. It has been passed down through four generations until it has reached him. West Bowers Farm is a north facing farm, this is unusual, but not necessarily an advantage for in this position it does not receive any direct sunlight.West Bowers Farm covers an entire 600 acres. The farmer grows crops on his farm and many fields in the farm are totally devoted to their growth.Mr Warner grows a variety of crops including barley,wheat and rape.Mr Warner likes to do his farming well and he is aided by the machinery available to a modern farmer.The tractor is the most useful piece of machinery on a farm and Mr Warner has 6 tractors,the largest being 150 horse power.Mr Warner also has 2 combine harvesters.
